help-file.title: IDLE
help-file.content: The term "Idle" is used to classify when your character is logged on but no commands are being entered. After you are idle for 10 minutes, you will automatically enter the "Void". After 15 minutes of idle time, you will "Idle Rent". Your character will exit the game at whatever location he/she is currently at. When you re-enter the game, you will start at whatever place you were last at. This also holds true for characters who are or are not link-dead.
